name: MTLRenderPipelineReflection
desc: Information about the arguments of a graphics function.

items.name: var vertexArguments: [MTLArgument]?
items.desc: An array of objects that describe the arguments of a vertex function.

items.name: var fragmentArguments: [MTLArgument]?
items.desc: An array of objects that describe the arguments of a fragment function.

items.name: var tileArguments: [MTLArgument]?
items.desc: An array of objects that describe the arguments of a tile shading function.
